cooperative.translation[0].definitions[0: He was doing his best to be cooperative.
cooperative.translation[0].definitions[1: made, done, or operated by people working together
a co-operative venture between the City Council and the police
cooperative.translation[0].definitions[2: a cooperative store, bank etc is operated by people working together as a cooperative
a co-operative store in a provincial town
cooperative.translation[1].definitions[0: a business or organization owned equally by all the people working there
